Ground-breaking New Zealand cancer therapy trial hits ‘exciting’ new milestone https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ground-writing-nz-cancer-therapy-tri-hits-exciting-new-milestone/YTG52KEKXVEE3EGMCPLL2QBVHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ground-writing-nz-cancer-therapy-tri-hits-exciting-new-milestone/YTG52KEKXVEE3EGMCPLL2QBVHM/ Jamie MortonSixty patients are being sought for the next phase of the cancer therapy trial. Mon, 22 Jul 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Malaghan Institute researchers are trying to find a Car-T cell cancer therapy more effective than current ones – but also safer and affordable – that can be introduced to our healthcare system.
Rotorua Lakes Council to vote on having public forums at meetings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-lakes-council-to-vote-on-having-public-forums-at-meetings/PAUFZTEIFFEYJFK23SFY6UNMD4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-lakes-council-to-vote-on-having-public-forums-at-meetings/PAUFZTEIFFEYJFK23SFY6UNMD4/ Laura SmithRotorua is considering adding public forums to meetings for what may be the first time. Mon, 22 Jul 2024 17:03:00 +0000 Rotorua Mayor Tania Tapsell is concerned public forums could be "weaponised". Photo / Laura Smith
Hastings District: First permanent bridge rebuild since Cyclone Gabrielle completed in Tūtira https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/first-major-permanent-rebuild-complete-in-tutira-since-cyclone-gabrielle/H4YBL6VU6RBIRKECA7J6N5N7GY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/first-major-permanent-rebuild-complete-in-tutira-since-cyclone-gabrielle/H4YBL6VU6RBIRKECA7J6N5N7GY/ A year and a half on from Cyclone Gabrielle, Chrystal Culvert in Tūtira is complete. Mon, 22 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The community and representatives from the Government, Hastings District Council, mana whenua, the project designers and contractors gathered to officially open Chrystal Culvert.
House and rent prices in major cities impacted more by population growth, not short-term rentals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/house-and-rent-prices-in-major-cities-impacted-more-by-population-growth-not-short-term-rentals/QBM4ETTS4RAORHQR2HQIZIG2LE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/house-and-rent-prices-in-major-cities-impacted-more-by-population-growth-not-short-term-rentals/QBM4ETTS4RAORHQR2HQIZIG2LE/ Population growth has more effect on local rent and house prices, Airbnb survey shows. Mon, 22 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 An Airbnb survey has found short-term rental accommodation has a limited effect on rental prices and no significant effect on house prices. Photo / Stock Image 123rf
Iwi group Toitu Tairāwhiti provides cabins to Wairoa for temporary housing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/23/iwi-group-toitu-tairawiti-provides-cabins-to-wairoa-for-temporary-housing/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/23/iwi-group-toitu-tairawiti-provides-cabins-to-wairoa-for-temporary-housing/ Toitu Tairāwhiti provides the first of seven temporary accommodation cabins to Wairoa. Mon, 22 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Toitu Tairāwhiti of Gisborne has provided the first seven temporary accommodation cabins to families in need in Wairoa. The families will be able to shift into them by the end of the month.

Mon, 22 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Kerikeri’s mainstreets are packed with vehicles during the day, something a concerned Kerikeri resident warned almost 50 years ago would take way the town’s ‘relaxed and pleasant’ atmosphere
